mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.total AS "total", a.answer_num AS "answerNum", a.status AS "status", a.type_id AS "typeId", a.type_name AS "typeName", a.create_user AS "createUser"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO law_theme_exercise ( id, type_id, total, status, create_time, opt_time, type_name, create_user, opt_user ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{typeId}, #{total}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{optTime}, #{typeName}, #{createUser}, #{optUser} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(DISTINCT task_id) as typeNum, COUNT (*) AS total, SUM (RIGHT) AS rightNum FROM law_theme_record WHERE TO_CHAR (CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM') = #{month} AND create_user = #{userId}

SELECT T . NAME AS "themeName", T . ID AS "themeId", E . ID AS "id", E .total AS "total", E .status AS "status", E .ANSWER_NUM AS "answerNum" FROM LAW_SYS_TOPIC T LEFT JOIN LAW_THEME_EXERCISE E ON T . ID = E .TYPE_ID AND E .CREATE_USER = #{userId} AND E .status <> #{status} WHERE T .IS_ENABLE = 1 AND T .DEL_FLAG = 0

SELECT t.id, t.com_content, t.question_difficulty, t.question_type, t.answer_id, t.legal_basis, t.answer_describle, t.answer_choice_number, c.name AS "themeName", r.ANSWER AS "userAnswer", r.right AS "right" FROM law_testquestions t LEFT JOIN law_theme_record r ON t.id = r.question_id AND r.task_id = #{id} AND r.create_user = #{userId} LEFT JOIN law_sys_topic c ON c.id = t.SPECIAL_KNOWLEDGE_ID
